title: Moving the Titanic - Rapid SharePoint Development for Teams using Visual Studio 2015
sessionTitle: Moving the Titanic - Rapid SharePoint Development for Teams using Visual Studio 2015
eventShortDescription:
Team Foundation Server 2015 (TFS) is the fully integrated solution to manage projects, giving developers, testers and management a single source of truth for all project needs. Using TFS to develop for SharePoint will make the development and maintenance process much more efficient and effective.

​
eventDescription:
Team Foundation Server 2015 (TFS) is the fully integrated solution to manage projects, giving developers, testers and management a single source of truth for all project needs. Using TFS to develop for SharePoint will make the development and maintenance process much more efficient and effective.

During the session you will see Adam Cogan explain how the 3 roles in a development team will benefit from using Team Foundation Server 2015:

  • What do Project Managers and stakeholders love?
  • What do Developers need to do?
  • What do Testers love? (including Web tests, Performance tests and Coded UI Tests)

Read more about Moving the Titanic - Rapid SharePoint Development for Teams using Visual Studio 2013
